UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides expressed in medicinal maggots of the blow fly Lucilia sericata show combinatorial activity against bacteria.
Literature.Author: Pöppel AK, Vogel H, Wiesner J, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D31(MIC=2.2µM),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=37.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis 1528(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 511(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 134/39(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis 987(no activity data),Penicillium chrysogenum JP36(no activity data),Candida albicans(no activity data)
